answers.answer: The card is the Ace of Clubs

question: Can the following be a sample space: $S=\{ \mbox{sunny}, \mbox{partly cloudy}, \mbox{cloudy} \}$?

answers.feedback: Correct. The sample space can contain the outcomes for any random experiment, such as how sunny tomorrow will be.

question: Select all of the following that can be an outcome of a random experiment.
Which of the following types of mathematical object can be a sample space?

answers.feedback: Correct. The sample space is the set of all outcomes.
